languages.text: Не успев и вскрикнуть, десятки отважных солдат исчезли во тьме. Дальнейший путь отряд проделал в траурном молчании.
Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.
languages.original_text: Не успев и вскрикнуть, десятки отважных солдат исчезли во тьме. Дальнейший путь отряд проделал в траурном молчании.

traits.locale_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.
Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.
Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.
Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

languages.text: 几十名勇敢的士兵还没来得及发出喊声，就消失在了幽深的裂隙之中。其余人在哀恸的沉默中继续前进。
languages.original_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

traits.locale_text: 几十名勇敢的士兵还没来得及发出喊声，就消失在了幽深的裂隙之中。其余人在哀恸的沉默中继续前进。

languages.text: 勇敢な兵士たち数十人は大声を上げる間もなく闇へと消えていく。残った一行は仲間を悼み、黙ったまま徒歩で進む。
languages.original_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

traits.locale_text: 勇敢な兵士たち数十人は大声を上げる間もなく闇へと消えていく。残った一行は仲間を悼み、黙ったまま徒歩で進む。

languages.text: Una multitud de valientes soldados se desvanece en la oscuridad antes de tener siquiera la oportunidad de gritar. El resto del grupo camina en un lúgubre silencio.
languages.original_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

traits.locale_text: Una multitud de valientes soldados se desvanece en la oscuridad antes de tener siquiera la oportunidad de gritar. El resto del grupo camina en un lúgubre silencio.

languages.text: Des dizaines de courageux soldats disparaissent dans les ténèbres avant même d'avoir eu le temps de crier. Le reste du groupe continue à progresser dans un silence pesant.
languages.original_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

traits.locale_text: Des dizaines de courageux soldats disparaissent dans les ténèbres avant même d'avoir eu le temps de crier. Le reste du groupe continue à progresser dans un silence pesant.

languages.text: Dutzende tapferer Soldaten verschwinden in der Dunkelheit und können nicht einmal mehr aufschreien. Der Rest der Gruppe geht in schweigender Trauer weiter.
languages.original_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

traits.locale_text: Dutzende tapferer Soldaten verschwinden in der Dunkelheit und können nicht einmal mehr aufschreien. Der Rest der Gruppe geht in schweigender Trauer weiter.

languages.text: Onlarca cesur asker, yardım çağırmaya bile fırsat bulamadan karanlığa karıştılar. Grubun geri kalanı, kederli bir sessizlikle ilerlemeye devam etti.
languages.original_text: Dozens of brave soldiers vanish into the darkness before they even have a chance to cry out. The rest of the party trek on in mournful silence.

traits.locale_text: Düzinelerce cesur asker, yardım çağırmaya bile fırsat bulamadan karanlığa karıştılar. Grubun geri kalanı, kederli bir sessizlikle ilerlemeye devam etti.
